This product was just introduced in our market and it is the only less-lethal product on the market that fires 4 separate rounds.

The JPX 4 Shot Defender is unique in that it offers four separate shots and the ability to reload each shot independently of the others.
The 4 shot defender is a full-sized pepper gun that only weighs in at 20 ounces full. The cartridges will fire pepper spray 23 feet at 405 MPH with a 2 foot spread.

If you understand the liability of carrying a firearm outside your home and don't want the risk of losing everything by using it in the wrong circumstance, then now you have an option. The JPX Defender is a less-lethal product designed to stop a perpetrator so that you can escape.

We have a limited supply and the guns can be found at WWW.MYSTUNGUN.COM, WWW.THEPEPPERGUN.COM AND WWW.JPXPOLICESUPPLY.COM

The JPX 4 Defender is not considered a firearm by ATF and no registration is required in most states where pepper spray is allowed. The Defender cartridge carries .35 oz of pepper spray making it legal in most states that regulate pepper volume.

Each JPX 4 comes with:

1 JPX Pepper Gun
4 OC cartridges
1 case

body_html:
Stippling, what is it? The definition of stippling is the creation of a pattern or layout using a vast amount of small dots. Now that you know what it is let us here at AT Tactical show you how we can take your firearm that was designed to fit millions, to fit one-you.

Once your firearm is stippled the excuse of “sweaty hands” will be no more. We offer various degrees of abrasiveness, along with different texture styles, such as our “Tree Bark” or “Grip Tape” patterns. AT stippling even offers to have a design of your choice to be worked into your firearm, thus making it 100% ONE OF A KIND, we do all our work by hand, therefore; there will be no other firearm like yours. Let AT Tactical contour your firearm to fit like a glove.

You wouldn’t wear a one size fits all suit, so why carry a one size fits all firearm.

AT Tactical is located just south of Tucson in Sahuarita, AZ. You may ship your weapon(s) to us then we can ship them directly back to you without any added FFL Dealer fees.

We are an FFL that offers $15 FFL Transfers, Slide Milling, Duracoat, Cerakote, Stippling, and Custom Kydex Holsters.

VETERAN OWNED AND OPERATED

We offer FAST turnaround times and GREAT prices.

Visit us at http://www.ATTactical.com for all our prices as well as see what else we have to offer including tactical lights and select magazines.

Check us out at www.facebook.com/ATTactical.

Stippling, what is it? The definition of stippling is the creation of a pattern or layout using a vast amount of small dots. Now that you know what it is let us here at AT Tactical show you how we can take your firearm that was designed to fit millions, to fit one-you.

Once your firearm is stippled the excuse of “sweaty hands” will be no more. We offer various degrees of abrasiveness, along with different texture styles, such as our “Tree Bark” or “Grip Tape” patterns. AT stippling even offers to have a design of your choice to be worked into your firearm, thus making it 100% ONE OF A KIND, we do all our work by hand, therefore; there will be no other firearm like yours. Let AT Tactical contour your firearm to fit like a glove.

You wouldn’t wear a one size fits all suit, so why carry a one size fits all firearm.

AT Tactical is located just south of Tucson in Sahuarita, AZ. You may ship your weapon(s) to us then we can ship them directly back to you without any added FFL Dealer fees.

We are an FFL that offers $15 FFL Transfers, Slide Milling, Duracoat, Cerakote, Stippling, and Custom Kydex Holsters.

VETERAN OWNED AND OPERATED

We offer FAST turnaround times and GREAT prices.

Visit us at http://www.ATTactical.com for all our prices as well as see what else we have to offer including tactical lights and select magazines.

Check us out at www.facebook.com/ATTactical.

We are based in Las Vegas, Nevada giving us an instant advantage over our competitors. Las Vegas burns through millions of rounds of ammo each and every month just because we can. This is the recreational shooting capital of the world. We have numerous indoor and outdoor ranges that tourists and locals experience guns and ammo they have only dreamed of. With that comes quality once fired brass from numerous sources. We acquire, fully sort, inspect, clean, and process to get our brass looking new and ready to load or sell.

Bite the Bullet is using quality name brand components from Sierra, Nosler, Hornady, Hodgdon, Accurate, CCI, Winchester, Remington, and Vihtavuori which make our remanufactured ammo perform just as well as factory loads. Our large rifle rounds and custom orders get "Match" type attention for you competitors out there. Case inspections, and numerous quality checks on powder and overall lengths are done throughout the process.

Our staff has decades of experience on both sides of the business. Our staff knows the craft. We do not run garbage through our guns, and we do not expect our customers to. If you have any questions, problems, or custom orders one of our knowledgeable ballistic technicians are there to help anytime. We supply ammo to some of the largest indoor ranges in Las Vegas. Trust the avid shooters in the business.

Thank You and Happy Shooting.

Regularly $849.00

MasterCard, Visa, Discover, Debit, Check or Cash

Delivery and Setup Available

Save on Shipping with local store pickup at our Dallas Store or order online and choose Check at checkout then pay only for the goods upon receiving them and not the freight as it will be subtracted.

The Schwinn Airdyne Evolution Comp is simply smart. The wind resistance is smooth and exponential, so the harder an exerciser pedals, the higher the resistance becomes, naturally providing the right workout for a novice exerciser or an elite athlete.

Smaller, quieter patented evolution fan wheel provides controlled airflow and a low step-over height for easy mounting and dismounting Second stage belt drive for a smoother and quieter ride.

The Schwinn Airdyne Comp's resistance-based braking creates zero friction and considerably less maintenance than other, more complex systems. Sealed cartridge bearings provide a smooth ride, reliability and extra-long life.

FEATURES:
- Air Resistance-based braking creates zero friction and provides considerably less maintenance than other more complex systems
- New Quieter Design using Main Belt Drive and Conical Cone Automatic Transmission for sharper resistance vs rpm curve
- Sealed cartridge bearings provide smooth ride, reliability and extra-long life
- Durable steel frame helps ensure a quiet ride
- Small, quiet fan-wheel cools user during exercise
- Low step-over height makes mounting and dismounting easy
- Ideal for rehabilitative therapy usage
- Resistance Levels: Infinite
- Resistance System: Air
- Drive System: Chain and Belt Drive equipped with a spring loaded chain tensioner
- Workouts: Simultaneous upper and lower body, or upper body workout only
- Style: Upright Stationary Bike

COMPUTER

- Display Readouts: Time, Distance, Calories, Calories per Hour, RPM, Workload, and Heart Rate (with heart rate transmitter chest strap, sold separately)

- Machine Weight: 104 lbs (47 kg)
- Maximum User Weight: 300 lbs (136 kg)
- Power Requirements: 2 AA Batteries
- Seat: Extra padded, anatomically correct seat

body_html:
For sale is a stunning, classic, limited production Zipp 3001 700C finished in Ferrari Fly Yellow. One of only 100 made, this is a Small Frame and Small Beam. Although I will not call it a new bike, it is as close to new as possible. This iconic 1990’s “superbike” is in remarkable condition, and would be perfect for riding or as the centerpiece of a collection. Repaint was done by award winning Ferrari restoration specialist.

Reluctantly, I am putting up this essentially new bike up for sale as my space is limited and have narrowed the focus of my collection. This, and the 2001 Zipp frame I am selling, is the last of my carbon fiber collection. Zipp Bicycles are beginning to be seen as a highly sought-after and wise investments by collectors the world over. To find one in this condition and originality is truly a rarity.

The frame is near perfect, as are the vintage almost NOS Shimano Dura Ace 7700 components. The only non-stock items are repaint to yellow, new (and very expensive) stickers and stem. I have taken hi-res pictures in order to show as much detail as possible and will gladly send to perspective buyer. The only flaw is a scratch on bottom bracket ring.

On a 100 point scale, (as per automobile concourse judging) this bike scores 98 points on originality and 98 points on cosmetics, amazing considering bike is close to 17 years old. This bike is totally original and period correct.

Here are more details on the Zipp 3001. Again, all of these components appear to be in unused condition.

-Zipp Carbon Fiber Frame and Beam.

-Shimano Dura Ace 7700 Components, in as new condition, include

Crankset with Chain rings
Rear Derailleur
Front Derailleur
Shift Levers
Cassette CS7700
Chain CN7700
Front brake, brake pad holder and brakes

-Zipp U-Brake Carbon Fiber/Aluminum rear wheel brake

-American Classic Headset

-Zipp quill stem

-Selle Italia 100 Year Anniversary (1897-1997) saddle, period correct and date coded to 1998, as new

-Profile Design handlebar and Aero Bar with period correct Profile Design Quick Stop brake handles. None original stem.

Zipp 530 Carbon Fiber 700C Wheels with ZIpp hubs and Dura Ace CS7700 Cassette. Fitted with vintage Veloflex Master Kevlar tires. Tires are on for the look but should be replaced if bike is to be ridden any kind of distance.

Zipp Carbon Fiber/Aluminum spider CA 420 Cranks 172.5 MM, circa 1998

The Zipp wheels and cranks are period correct and appear to have has some use but are in excellent condition

Overview:

THE NEW REMINGTON® MODEL 1911 R1 Carry Commander Crimson Trace®

The accuracy and reliability that have made the 1911 an American icon now shine brighter than ever. Features include a crisp trigger, dovetailed front and rear sights, precision-machined slide and frame, and Crimson Trace® grips. The new Model 1911 R1 is truly the finest blend of exacting craftsmanship and out-of-box performance available today. Every element is produced with ultra-tight tolerances on equipment representing the height of modern technology. The result is a sweet-shooting advancement of a legendary design we’re more than proud to put our name on.

The Remington Model 1911 R1 Carry Commander is manufactured with pride and precision, to the exacting standards you’ve come to expect from Remington. Right here in Ilion, New York.
Key Features:

Match-grade stainless steel 4 ¼" barrel and bushing
De-horned carbon steel frame and slide
Satin black oxide finish
Beavertail grip safety with checkered memory bump (25 LPI)
Checkered front strap and mainspring housing (25 LPI)
Ambidextrous safety
Novak® sights with Tritium front sight
Enhanced safety
Flared and lowered ejection port
Crimson Trace® grips
Aluminum trigger with 3 ½-5lb. pull
One 7-round and one 8-round magazine
